        const newNode = factory.createFunctionDeclaration(func.decorators, modifiers, func.asteriskToken, name, func.typeParameters, func.parameters, func.type, body);

Actually if i pass `modifiers` in, the `textChanges` does not happy and break an assert.

Out of curiosity, which assert? We probably should consider converting an empty modifier list into `undefined` in the factory, since our parser never produces an empty modifier list (if it fails to parse modifiers, it returns `undefined`).
